Main

Mattia Doro {#title}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Post-doctoral fellow - [University of Padova](www.unipd.it)

I'm a Cognitive Neuroscientist at the University of Padova. My research
interests are related to visual attention and visual short-term memory.
